name: Arm & Hammer Pet Scents Gel Odor Eliminator, Solid Baking Soda Deodorizer for Pet Areas, Homes, Litter Boxes, and Rooms, Long-Lasting Odor Control, Fresh Breeze Scent, 15 Oz
short_description: STRONG ODOR ELIMINATION: Designed to help absorb and neutralize everyday pet odors using a solid gel format combined with baking soda, making it suitable for common pet areas like litter boxes, crates, and living spaces where odors tend to linger.

EASY SET AND USE: Simple solid gel deodorizer requires no plugs, batteries, or sprays, allowing placement in pet rooms, bathrooms, or entryways to help manage odors with minimal effort and no daily maintenance.

BAKING SODA FORMULA: Formulated with Arm & Hammer baking soda, known for odor absorption, to help reduce unwanted smells from pets, food, or trash while supporting a fresher indoor environment over time.

PET FRIENDLY DESIGN: Solid gel air freshener is designed for use around pets when used as directed, providing odor control without aerosols, flames, or continuous sprays that may disrupt daily household routines.
LONG LASTING SCENT: Fresh Breeze scent is designed to release gradually as the gel shrinks, helping maintain consistent odor control in small to medium rooms without overwhelming fragrance intensity.
VERSATILE PLACEMENT: Suitable for use in litter box areas, pet sleeping spaces, closets, bathrooms, and other odor prone rooms, offering flexible placement options throughout the home.
LOW PROFILE CONTAINER: Compact 15 oz container fits discreetly on shelves or floors, helping manage pet related odors while blending into everyday home spaces without drawing attention.
product_description: Arm & Hammer Pet Scents Gel Odor Eliminator is designed to help manage everyday pet odors in homes using a solid gel deodorizer enhanced with baking soda. It offers a simple way to support a fresher indoor environment without sprays or plugs. The solid gel format allows gradual scent release as it naturally shrinks over time, helping reduce odors in areas like litter boxes, pet crates, bathrooms, and common living spaces. The Fresh Breeze scent is formulated to remain noticeable without becoming overpowering. This pet area deodorizer is easy to place and requires no setup or maintenance, making it suitable for routine household use. Its compact container allows discreet placement while supporting ongoing odor control where pets spend the most time.

name: POOPH Pet Odor Eliminator, 32oz - Eliminates Odors at The Molecular Level, Dogs, Cats, Freshener, Eliminator, Urine, Poop, Pee, Deodorizer, Natures, Puppy, Fresh, Clean, Furniture, Potty
short_description: POOPH SAFELY eliminates the toughest odors WITHOUT fragrances or harmful ingredients. It’s smarter to ELIMINATE odors instead of COVERING THEM UP with fragrances Fragrances can be particularly irritating for dogs and cats who have 10,000X greater sense of smell than people! Even fragrances that smell good in household products have been characterized as potentially dangerous “indoor air pollutants” associated with a wide range of unexpected health consequences—so choose the products that get into your home wisely!
Proprietary technology eliminates odors at the source, leaving NO chemical residuals or fragrances behind – just clean, fresh air.
POOPH SAFELY eliminates “stink” from carpets, rugs, upholstery, drapes or hard surfaces and leaves no NO chemical residuals or fragrances behind – just clean, fresh air.
Ideal for urine, feces, vomit, sour, spoiled and nasty food odors, garbage cans, stinky upholstery and more.
POOPH is eco-conscious and SAFE for people, pets, and plants because it contains no fragrances harmful ingredients.

name: Pet-Pourri Smell Ya Litter Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray, Purrfectly Bamboo 3.4 Fl Oz, Up to 170 Uses, Pet Odor Remover with Essential Oils for Air, Carpet, Urine, Vet Recommended, Bergamot Bamboo Scent
short_description: Instant Freshness, No Lingering Odors: A few sprays of Pourri Purrfectly Bamboo odor neutralizer spray instantly deodorize cat odors, especially strong urine and litter box smells, so your home stays fresh and inviting

Multi-Purpose and Whole Home Friendly: Safe for use in the air, litter box, and on fabrics, to freshen up furniture, rugs, carpet, curtains, and any place kitty funks linger. Infused with Pourri's Funk Lock Technology to lock in odors

Cat-Friendly Formula: Unlike standard air fresheners, this deodorizing spray can be used directly in the litter box to maintain freshness between pees, poops and scoops. Free from harsh ingredients for a gentle experience for your fluffy feline friend

Naturally Long-Lasting Fragrance: Infused with Bergamot, Jasmine and Bamboo, this formula leaves behind a calming, fresh aroma that helps make litter box duty a little less doody. Simply spritz 3–5 times in a clean litter box for a sweet, inviting scent

Fresh and Clean Formula: Pet Pourri spray is made with natural plant-based ingredients and essential oils. Leaping Bunny Certified, never tested on animals and formulated without dyes, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, because your pet's health matters

One Brand, All the Funk: The Pourri Promise means plant-based, stink-stopping sprays that actually work. Whether it’s your trash can, shoes, diaper pail, fabric, or your furry friend’s corner—there’s a Pourri for that - just spray and go
product_description: Poo-Pourri Smell Ya Purrfectly Bamboo Litter Deodorizer Spray Love your cat, not their litter box smell? That’s where Pourri Purrfectly Bamboo Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray comes in. With just a few spritzes, our Proprietary Funk Lock Technology neutralizes tough odors—especially strong urine and litter box smells—so your home stays fresh and inviting. Infused with a relaxing blend of Bergamot, Jasmine, Bamboo and Pear, it refreshes the air and fabrics while keeping your litter box smelling clean between scoops. Suitable for whole-home freshness, Purrfectly Bamboo works in the air, on furniture, rugs, curtains, and any place kitty funk lingers. Made with natural, plant-based ingredients and essential oils, this litter box spray is never tested on animals and contains no dyes, sulfates, parabens, or phthalates, gentle enough to spray directly in the litter box. Simply spritz 3-5 times inside the clean litter box, fill with litter, and enjoy a fresh, clean scent as it freshens the odor.  From the makers of Poo~Pourri, Pet-Pourri lives up to the Pourri Promise—plant-based, stink-stopping solutions that work anywhere odors lurk. Whether it’s shoes, trash cans, diaper pails, fabrics, or your furry friend’s favorite spot, there’s a Pourri for that.

product_description: Cat owners everywhere are all too familiar with the dreaded smell of a litter box. Luckily, Nature's Miracle Litter Box Deodorizer aids litter in removing tough urine and feces odors your cat leaves behind. The cat odor control formula is designed to be used with all litter types, as well as with both automatic and manual litter boxes. The litter deodorizing powder has a fresh scent to keep your litter box smelling fresh and crisp, making it ideal for multi-cat homes. To use, simply apply, fill and reapply! See label for complete of directions. Our bottles are also made with 25% Post-Consumer Recycled Material. Why choose Nature’s Miracle® products? Nature’s Miracle® pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 40 years. When cute pets make not-so-cute messes, you can rely on Nature’s Miracle® products to get the job done.

name: Cat Litter Odor Deodorizer - Ozone & Negative Ion Cat Odor Eliminator with Sensor Monitor, Safe Air Purifier for Pets,Odor Remover for Multi-Purpose Use
short_description: Dual-Action Odor Elimination: Our cat litter odor remover combines ozone and negative ion technology to remove odors at the source. Ozone breaks down tough ammonia, hydrogen sulfide , and organic compounds in cat litter, while negative ions clump fine dust and neutralize airborne particles. It is tested to eliminate up to 99% of litter box odors efficiently.Your cat deserves better than a stinky litter box

Smart Sensor: Cat odor remover is equipped with a sensitive sensor monitor, this device automatically detects when your cat approaches the litter box and powers down to avoid disturbance. It reactivates once the area is clear, ensuring continuous odor control without manual switching. No more forgetting to turn it on/off—perfect for busy pet parents and curious kittens

3 Modes, 1 Effortless Solution:P1 - Gentle Ion Mode: Runs quietly 24/7, releasing tiny ions to trap dust and keep air fresh；P2 - Quick Odor Rescue: Tap to activate when your cat’s just done with the litter box；P3 -Smart Cycle Mode: It alternates between ions and ozone automatically, adjusting to the day’s chaos.No complicated buttons, no guessing games. Whether it’s daily freshness, emergency odor busting, or all-day versatility

Cat-Safe Ozone Technology: Our cat-friendly odor eliminator uses a whisper-low 0.03ppm ozone level —scientifically proven to neutralize odors without stressing your cat’s lungs. Unlike harsh sprays or fake-fragrance masking agents, ozone destroys ammonia, urine, and musty smells at the molecular level, leaving only pure, natural air

5.Multi-Purpose Freshness: Our ozone purifier plugs directly into any outlet and starts neutralizing odors in seconds—no filters to buy, replace, or clean. Just plug it in, choose your mode, and let science do the work. It is lightweight and compact , perfect for: cat litter boxes, pet pads, shoe cabinetes, kitchen, bathroom, wardrobe, other animals' living area etc

name: Fresh Step Litter Box Charcoal Odor Eliminator Powder, Cat Litter Deodorizer Additive to Help Absorb and Control Strong Litter Box Odors for Cleaner Smelling Homes, 15 Oz
short_description: CHARCOAL ODOR ABSORPTION: Activated charcoal works to trap and reduce strong litter box odors by absorbing odor-causing moisture, helping maintain a noticeably fresher litter area between full litter changes in active cat households.

ADDITIVE FOR EXISTING LITTER: Designed to be sprinkled directly into current cat litter, boosting odor control performance without requiring a litter switch or disrupting your cat’s established litter box routines.

EASY POST-SCOOP APPLICATION: Apply a light layer after scooping to help neutralize odors quickly, supporting consistent freshness as part of regular litter box cleaning and ongoing household maintenance routines.

COMPATIBLE WITH MOST LITTER TYPES: Safe for use with clumping, non-clumping, crystal, and natural litters, giving cat owners flexibility regardless of the litter material currently used in their home environment.

HELPS REDUCE LINGERING SMELLS: Targets odor sources at the litter surface by absorbing moisture that contributes to persistent smells developing between scheduled litter box changes over time and regular daily use.

LIGHTWEIGHT POWDER FORMAT: Fine powder spreads evenly across litter for uniform odor control coverage, allowing the charcoal to contact odor sources efficiently while remaining easy to store and handle between applications.

15 OZ CONTAINER INCLUDED: Includes a 15 ounce container of charcoal litter deodorizer powder designed for routine odor control in single- or multi-cat households where litter boxes are used daily and maintained regularly.
product_description: Fresh Step Litter Box Charcoal Odor Eliminator Powder is designed to help absorb and control strong litter box odors. This deodorizer works as an additive to existing litter for improved freshness between changes. Formulated with charcoal, the powder helps trap odor-causing moisture at the source. It can be sprinkled directly into the litter box after scooping to help maintain a cleaner-smelling environment. With a 15 oz container, this litter deodorizer is suitable for regular use in single- or multi-cat households. It works with most litter types and fits easily into routine litter box maintenance.

With an initial burst of freshness that lasts for that typically lasts several days, our litter box air freshener scent is so good you’ll wish it could stay forever. When the fragrance fades, rest assured that the cat box deodorizer is still in full effect; if you no longer smell our scent but your cat litter box remains odor-free, the product is working!

SAFE FOR YOUR PETS – Our cat deodorizer odor eliminator is thoughtfully crafted to be safe for your cat, making it a perfect addition to any family home.
